spiritsExplanation: The workout video is classified as 'Soothing & Restorative' due to its focus on relaxation and aiding sleep. The title explicitly states 'Yoga Nidra for Sleep' and 'Guided Meditation to Help You Drift into Deep, Restful Sleep,' indicating a purpose aligned with rest and stress reduction. The description emphasizes 'the ultimate relaxation technique,' 'releasing stress and tension,' and notes its utility for a 'deep, restful sleep.' These descriptors underline the gentle, healing nature typical of Soothing & Restorative workouts. Tags like 'meditation for sleep,' 'Insomnia meditation,' and 'Sleep aid' further reinforce this classification. User comments corroborate the effectiveness of the video in promoting relaxation and aiding sleep, mentioning terms like 'restfully' and 'softly, but normally.' No aspects of the metadata suggest high intensity, flow, structure, athleticism, or an adventurous component, allowing a very strong confidence of 0.95 that the video embodies the Soothing & Restorative spirit.
